ARABIC: قَالَ أَلْقُوا۟ فَلَمَّآ أَلْقَوْا۟ سَحَرُوٓا۟ أَعْيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسْتَرْهَبُوهُمْ وَجَآءُو بِسِحْرٍ عَظِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'You throw.' And when they threw, they cast a spell on the people's eyes and caused them to eel great fear of them. They produced an extremely powerful magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You cast it first," answered Moses. When they cast their spell, they bewitched the eyes of the people and petrified them by conjuring up a great charm.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: 'You throw.' So when they threw [their rods], they enchanted the eyes of the people, and struck them with awe, and produced a mighty sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He replied, "Throw yours first." Their great magic bewitched people's eyes and terrified them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “You throw”; when they threw, they cast a magic spell upon the people’s eyes and terrified them, and they brought a great magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He [Musa] said: "Throw you (first)." So when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people, and struck terror into them, and they displayed a great trick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Cast. So when they cast, they deceived the people's eyes and frightened them, and they produced a mighty enchantment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'You cast.' And when they cast they put a Spell upon the people's eyes, and called forth fear of them, and produced a mighty sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Throw! And when they threw they cast a spell upon the people's eyes, and overawed them, and produced a mighty spell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "You throw [first]!" When they made their cast, they bewitched the eyes of the people and struck them with awe, for they showed a great [feat of] magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: cast ye. Then when they cast clown, they enchanted the eyes of the people, and terrified them and brought mighty magic to bear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Throw [yours].’ So when they threw, they bewitched the people’s eyes and overawed them, producing a tremendous magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Said Moses: "Throw ye (first)." So when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people, and struck terror into them: for they showed a great (feat of) magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He [Musa (Moses)] said: "Throw you (first)." So when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people, and struck terror into them, and they displayed a great magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Throw' he replied. And when they threw, they bewitched the people's eyes and terrified them, and produced great sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “You throw!” And when they threw, they beguiled the eyes of the people, and intimidated them, and produced a mighty magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Throw," and when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people and struck terror into them, and they presented a great [feat of] magic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:116] He said, ‘Cast!’, this is a command permitting them to cast first, as a means to manifesting the truth. And when they cast, their ropes and staffs, they put a spell upon the people’s eyes, misleading them from perceiving the real state of these [ropes and staffs], and overawed them, scared them, by making them appear to be slithering snakes, and produced a mighty sorcery.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He) Moses (said: Throw) first whatever you are going to throw! (And when they threw) 70 staffs and 70 ropes (they cast a spell upon the people's eyes, and overawed them) scared them, (and produced a mighty spell) it is also said that this means: a clear lie.
